## withClassType() function

A class decorator for record classes that stores the class [Type](./paratype.type.md) in a static property named `classType`<!-- -->.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare function withClassType<T extends RecordClass<Props, Data>, Props, Data>(target: {
    new (input: Props | Data): T;
    readonly classType: Type<T>;
    readonly dataType: Type<Data>;
}): void;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  target | { new (input: Props \| Data): T; readonly classType: [Type](./paratype.type.md)<!-- -->&lt;T&gt;; readonly dataType: [Type](./paratype.type.md)<!-- -->&lt;Data&gt;; } | The record class |

<b>Returns:</b>

void
